content.body:
> <@kriskowal:matrix.org> I’ve finished a deck for tomorrow, should time permit. I added this to the end of the meeting as it shows where I think we’re converging. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_juf8l8PCrVHA4iA1G4BwQ1JsuXMjOVa/view

I like this. Where does the module descriptor go?
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @kriskowal:matrix.org
I’ve finished a deck for tomorrow, should time permit. I added this to the end of the meeting as it shows where I think we’re converging. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_juf8l8PCrVHA4iA1G4BwQ1JsuXMjOVa/view
I like this. Where does the module descriptor go?

content.body: Module descriptors cease to be necessary. When implementing a Compartment in user code, module instances replace module descriptors. User-mode Compartments aren’t able to address modules from the host compartment by name, but import reflection replaces that role.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Module descriptors cease to be necessary. When implementing a Compartment in user code, module instances replace module descriptors. User-mode Compartments aren’t able to address modules from the host compartment by name, but import reflection replaces that role.

content.body: e.g., `defer import fs from 'fs'; new Compartment{{ modules: { fs } }).import('fs')` is a possible solution with a user-code Compartment implementation.
content.formatted_body: e.g., defer import fs from 'fs'; new Compartment{{ modules: { fs } }).import('fs') is a possible solution with a user-code Compartment implementation.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: e.g., `defer import fs from 'fs'; new Compartment{{ modules: { fs } }).import('fs')` is a possible solution with a user-code Compartment implementation.
e.g., defer import fs from 'fs'; new Compartment{{ modules: { fs } }).import('fs') is a possible solution with a user-code Compartment implementation.

content.body: (where `defer import` is import reflection. I haven’t seen a syntax I like for that yet, so just riffing here.)
content.formatted_body: (where defer import is import reflection. I haven’t seen a syntax I like for that yet, so just riffing here.)

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: (where `defer import` is import reflection. I haven’t seen a syntax I like for that yet, so just riffing here.)
(where defer import is import reflection. I haven’t seen a syntax I like for that yet, so just riffing here.)

content.body: Actually, for inter-compartment linkage, we would have to implement module-descriptors in user code.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Actually, for inter-compartment linkage, we would have to implement module-descriptors in user code.

content.body: Are any champions going to seek advancement for module proposals at the next plenary?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Are any champions going to seek advancement for module proposals at the next plenary?
